test_data_analyze module¶

class test_data_analyze.TestAnalyze¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the function data_analyze.

Methods

test_analyze_data(remove, path, mocker)

As data_analyze is not a pure function, these unit tests simply check whether the expected dependencies are called.
test_analyze_data(remove, path, mocker)¶

As data_analyze is not a pure function, these unit tests simply check whether the expected dependencies are called. Pytest parametrize tests for both book and batch paths.

Notes

Mocked dependencies were given specified return values. These return values are simply a placeholder to maintain functionality and are not the actual outputs of each dependency (should already have a separate unit test).

class test_data_analyze.TestGenerateDirectory¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the function generate_directories.

Methods

test_generate_directories(remove)

This function tests for overall functionality.
test_generate_directories(remove)¶

This function tests for overall functionality. Takes in a dataframe title (polymer) and a global output directory, and returns custom directories for the specific polymer. Removes all generated directories in teardown.

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the function modeling_data.

Methods

test_modeling_data(remove, path, mocker)

As modeling_data is not a pure function, these unit tests simply check whether the expected dependencies are called.
test_modeling_data(remove, path, mocker)¶

As modeling_data is not a pure function, these unit tests simply check whether the expected dependencies are called. Pytest parametrize tests for both book and batch paths.

Notes

Mocked dependencies were given specified return values. These return values are simply a placeholder to maintain functionality and are not the actual outputs of each dependency (should already have a separate unit test).
